item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is:
Diesel Lounge
http://www.dieselloun...

Join us for happy hour at Diesel (944 State Street).

DRINK SPECIALS:
Kindly provided by Brian and RJ
$3.00 drafts all night for the NHC (usually only 9-11)
$5 martinis (usually $7) -- 10 listed on the mirrored board (I recommend Swedish Fish)

Diesel does not serve food. Update: I did not have time to make mini-creme puffs, but did make some mini pizza breads and will bring chips and salsa. You could byo snack...

**ALSO, please drop some extra change into a donation can/pocket for the NHC dues. Meetup.com charges a monthly fee for us to have this wonderful networking site and ROBEN should not have to foot the bill, so please give a little something towards the fees. Those not at this event will have the chance to donate at another one!**


Contact info: Karen 203-535-8751

Nothing cancels Happy Hour!
item.name: 5/14 Monday Happy Hour -- DIESEL LOUNGE
